name: Solarlab
description: Solarlab is a simple space simulator designed for educational purposes (with a bit of fun thrown in as well). Ever wondered what planets sound like? What its like to explore moon and mars bases? what it would be like to drive a rover on Venus, well here's your chance. Solarlab was built by me in a weekend and has slowly been added to over the past few years. Its now a complete project but I still revisit it from time to time, so check back for updates every now and then. Its taught me a lot about unity, space, science and even physics. I've even taken it to a local library for an space exhibition. There are some bugs that I am aware of already such as the menu not loading when you are in explorer mode on the moon or mars. If you like it, feel free to leave me a comment, I would love to hear from you.
